DataElement.preferredName: Unresectable Due To Metastasis Discovered During Surgery Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to record information related to being unable to remove a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present from the spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another during surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Unresectable Due To Metastasis Discovered During Surgery
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Unable to be removed with surgery._A procedure to remove or repair a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present.  An operation._Caused by or resulting from._The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor._See for the first time; identify._At some point in a given period of time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Unable to be removed with surgery.

Concepts.definition: Not capable of being removed by surgery.

Property.preferredName: Due To Metastasis Discover During Surgery
Property.preferredDefinition: Caused by or resulting from.:The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.:See for the first time; identify.:At some point in a given period of time.:A procedure to remove or repair a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present.  An operation.

Concepts.definition: The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.
See for the first time; identify.
At some point in a given period of time.
A procedure to remove or repair a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present.  An operation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a single character text field to record data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
